title: Climate Change Education Design Through Understanding Climate Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science and mathematics concepts (graph interpretation, data analysis, elementary environmental knowledge)
context.additional_context: Emphasis on analyzing climate systems through mathematical modeling with data visualization tools accessible via personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can graphically explain interactions between components of the climate system (atmosphere, ocean, biosphere, etc.).
Learners can interpret climate change data using mathematical tools (regression analysis, trend lines).
Learners can simulate the impact of human activities on the climate system using feedback loop models.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
